meanings.definition: Having fair hair or a light complexion.
meanings.sent1: She is the blondest girl in our class.
meanings.sent2: The blondest child in the family always gets the most sunburned.
meanings.sent3: The blondest puppy in the litter was named Sunny.
meanings.sent4: Her blondest hair shone like a halo in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The blondest clouds in the sky looked like fluffy cotton candy.

meanings.definition: The superlative form of the adjective 'blonde'.
meanings.sent1: She won the award for being the blondest in the room.
meanings.sent2: The blondest in the group always stands out.
meanings.sent3: The blondest at the party was the center of attention.
meanings.sent4: His blondest was like a beacon in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The blondest of all the flowers in the garden was a rare species.
